card.name: Placebo
card.description: A filler card used to pad out an incomplete deck.

card.name: Skeleton
card.description: A spooky, scary, undead warrior. Strikes with an ancient sword.

card.name: Angel
card.description: A holy messenger that spreads the word of peace. Lyre afficionado.

card.name: Salamander
card.description: One of THOSE kinds of Salamanders (the dragon kind)

card.name: Angry Beaver
card.description: Hoover Dam, get a load of those teeth. The tail is pretty deadly, too.

card.name: Battle Robo
card.description: Its primary function is to smash skulls. Also makes excellent waffles.

card.name: Claw Mole
card.description: Completely blind, with razor-sharp claws. Proof of Nature's sense of irony.

card.name: Eagle Eye
card.description: A fierce bird of prey with immaculate vision. Strikes from above.

card.name: Wood Troll
card.description: A lethargic, warty beast who guards the ancient forest.

card.name: Assassin
card.description: His job is to kill, and he's very good at his job. Not a crazed gunman.

card.name: Ouroboros
card.description: The eternal dragon. Through it, all is consumed and reborn.
